Section.Catchline: Responsibilities of the clerk of the circuit court.

Subsection.Text: In addition to the duty to serve as the custodian of the guardianship files, the clerk shall review each initial and annual guardianship report to ensure that it contains information about the ward addressing, as appropriate:

Paragraph.Text: The application of insurance, private benefits, and government benefits;
The physical and mental health examinations; and
The initial verified inventory or the annual accounting.

Subsection.Text: The clerk shall, within 30 days after the date of filing of the initial or annual report of the guardian of the person, complete his or her review of the report.

Within 90 days after the filing of the verified inventory and accountings by a guardian of the property, the clerk shall audit the verified inventory and the accountings. The clerk shall advise the court of the results of the audit.
The clerk shall report to the court when a report is not timely filed.
